name: Puppy Mill
description:
Ever lived in a puppy mill? No? Well, now is your chance!

Reflect on life living in a puppy mill in a dark dystopian (or utopian) future controlled by robot overlords. Are robot overlords necessarily evil? Or is it humanity that is evil? Maybe you just want to see some different perspectives in life?

And how fast can you escape the room? Can you avoid being trapped by this part-procedurally generated and part-randomly generated NPC crowd? Can you identify and select the right NPCs to talk to?

Known glitches:

When you enter the options menu on the title screen and hit the cancel button, your game may crash.
